title: Content Manager
content:
Are you a good writer? We're currently looking for a highly creative content writer to create and outsource high quality content for our websites.
Position offered: Content Manager 
 
Duties and Responsibilities:
      Write content including features and news articles;
      Edit stories for content, grammar, voice and length;
      Assist with story fact checking;
      Plan and conceptualize editorial content;
      Compiling keyword research and analysis.
 
Essential Skills: 
Proven experience in writing, editing, and proof reading;Ability to work under strict deadlines; High level of creativity;Excellent communication skills (email, Skype, in-person);   Professional fluency in English;Optimist.
 
Desired Skills:
Degree in English Philology
 Before applying please read iBus Media Recruitment Privacy Notice carefully.   
Department:
Content
